text: Come See the Paradise is a movie made in 1990. It is about people from Japanese families in the United States during World War II. The movie shows how some of those people were put into prison because they were Japanese. ==References== Category:1990s war movies Category:1990 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Multilingual movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Alan Parker Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Oregon Category:Movies set in Seattle Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Come See the Paradise
